name: Warranty receipt NFTs connected to securely vaulted works of art and antiquities.

metadata.name: Warranty on Tibetan Gilt Bronze Figurine of Acala
metadata.description:
Possession of this NFT indicates that you have paid for warranty certifiying this copy as signed.

[See this object's Mattereum Asset Passport](https://passport.mattereum.com/mtrm.tg.acala.1819c.m034) for further details.

Vault fees are pre-paid on this asset for 12 months from the time this NFT was issued. Subsequent vault fees are the sole responsibility of the asset owner.

attributes.value:
1% of the sale price of the object or its corresponding NFT.

The Warranty Price is referred to in the Mattereum Certification Contract as the "Certifier Fee".
Up to the sale price of the object or its corresponding NFT.
